message: This is my initial offer. I propose we split the money 3:2 in favor of Alice.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair start. Your turn!
I believe a fair division would be equal shares. This maintains a sense of equity in our partnership.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more considering my proposal in round 2. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
